website_summaries.verdict: While you won't have to worry about cutting yourself, you may have to go over each area a few times to get a clean shave.
pros: You can do a painless dry or wet shave, and it's gentle enough for people who have skin conditions
cons: This unit sometimes has problems charging, and it doesn't give a real close shave

website_summaries.verdict: This is an inexpensive and effective ladies' electric razor and is an especially impressive choice for women looking for an electric shave option.
pros: Can be used effectively with wet or dry skin, making shaving at any time easy
Comes with easy-to-use cleaning brush to help keep device tidy
Provides close shave, preventing razor burn
Safe to use and cannot cut skin
cons: Has to be charged for 12 hours to get a full charge

customer_reviews.title: NOT for lady parts. Maybe legs.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to use this on your: Mons pubis, bikini, down there, downstairs, pubes, pubic hair, and other ways of beating around the BUSH rather than just saying vagina (is that allowed on this website) or vaginal area or what have you.. Look elsewhere. Seriously. If you're just trimming, I don't know, maybe it'll work. If you're trying to keep it Brazilian-bare, it's not gonna happen. It's terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Human

customer_reviews.title: Charger
customer_reviews.text: My razor just arrived. I wanted to get it charging right away but discovered that the razor attaches right to the charger, no cord. In my bathroom, the outlet is right below my medicine cabinet so I can't plug it in there. It won't be a big problem to charge it somewhere else but I didn't see where anyone else mentioned that.
customer_reviews.author: RKY

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof at all.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, not waterproof at all. Maybe ok if you don't use it in the shower but it failed in about a month. Wife was saying it just kept dying really fast. Took the blade out and the top cover and noticed water inside the mechanism. That right there told me it was toast. Proceeded to take it apart and found rust and water through out the assembly and green rust. See pictures. Bad design. Luckily Amazon had amazing customer service and they refunded my money and because it is a razor they told me to keep it. It's going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Fishguy

customer_reviews.title: It came defective and apparently I can’t return.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve purchased, the other one being a year ago. Since it’s cheaper to buy a new one than to replace the blades, I bought this and was wondering why it wasn’t working well, and popped off the head, and realized it was crooked. I then compared my old one to the new one, and knew it was defective. I tried to return, but apparently, even with a manufacturer defect, I can’t return. I am happy with the product, as I have wrote a 5 star review before, but the reason I am giving 1 star is because I shouldn’t have to pay for a defective razor, and not be able to exchange! It’s ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Will have to throw it away after months of bad charging experiences
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Panasonic product I've purchased that was completely a bust! Usually the products are well designed and reliable. The problem is the charger. The unit keeps falling off the charger, which has to plug directly into the wall. This necessitates plugging it in over a carpet, so that the unit doesn't break when it falls. And it still falls off. Will have to throw it away after months of bad charging experiences.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this razor for my daughter as a first shaver. It only worked 2-3x before it quit completely and in the few times it turned on she had difficulty removing the hair from her legs completely- and she is a young girl, not an older woman with course hair. Don't buy this- even at the inexpensive price! It's wasted money on something that doesn't work, put those extra few dollars towards a better quality shaver.
customer_reviews.author: CharlesM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I have been shaving my lady parts for pretty much my whole adult life with your normal blade type razor. I have tried all kinds of different razors over the years. One day I happened on this Panasonic and it looked like it just might actually work and it didn't cost an arm and a leg. I am so glad I decided to give it a try. I charged it up and it works like a charm. I put it up and thought I would have to charge it when I needed it again but it held onto the charge for the next time I needed It. I love the shape of it also. Great little shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett0522

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this again.  Pure  junk.
customer_reviews.text: I researched this razor before I bought it and was sure I picked a good one. Well, it never did shave right. Then it started not holding a charge. Tried doing a chat with the company, chat wouldn't go thru. Called their 800 # no one answers except an automated chick. Then wanted to charge $9.95 a hour. Back to the website, blocked every way I tried to get thru to them They keep themselves hemmed in. I'm going to send it back to the company anyway. It's no good to me.
customer_reviews.author: beachbaby651

customer_reviews.title: Good but really flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this razor. It was a painless, safe way of shaving without worrying about accidently cutting yourself with a razor or enduring the pain of waxing. It is easy to use and actually gives smoother finish than a razor. The reason I am giving it two stars is because, I accidentally dropped the shaver and the blade broke. Now the shaver is unusable after merely having it for a few weeks (actually less than 3 weeks). It's a lot of money to spend on something that wouldn't even survive one fall.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Cheap disposables work a lot better!
customer_reviews.text: The shaver just doesn't seem leave legs very smooth! You can spend a lot of time trying to get a good shave and still not get good results. My legs have very light hair growth and I thought an electric shaver would work really well, but I am going back to the cheap disposables!
customer_reviews.author: Llama Kisses

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with its performance while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Should last longer than two years! I don't use this razor often, but each time I used it, I cleaned it with the brush provided. Probably in two years, I have used it a dozen times. A couple of weeks ago, when I raised the popup trimmer to clean, the button got stuck up & wouldn't come down. When I took the whole head off the razor to clean, it fell apart. I carefully put it back together, but when I used it again this week the same thing happened. I was pleased with its performance while it worked, but it just didn't hold up as it should have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst shave ever
customer_reviews.text: I have used Braun men’s electric shavers for years but my pop-up trimmer broke and I didn’t want to spend $200 on a new razor so I thought I’d try this one. Worst shave ever!! Of course I didn’t expect it to be as close as a razor but I did expect it to be comparable to a men’s shaver NOT! It said it works best in the shower with gel/cream so I tried it like that, after I got out of the shower I shaved with my Braun and returned this.
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA SWEET

customer_reviews.title: Pink tax is real. Do yourself a favor, buy a mens shaver.
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to actually shave my legs. It leaves so much stubble! No possible way to get a clean shave, poor quality, and began rusting after one use even though I did my best to dry it! Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Rockwood

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This shaver was great until about 2 months in with gentle use (maybe twice monthly shaving my pubic area). Recently, it's stopped working at all. It'll turn on, but putting it to the skin and trying to shave off hair does absolutely nothing. This isn't a charge issue as it was plugged in and charging for over 14 hours before I attempted to use it again. It's just broken, I guess, which is pretty bad after such a short time and after so little use. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lusitania

customer_reviews.title: Good luck!
customer_reviews.text: The shaver itself works really well. I am not thrilled though with the charger plug. It is a square block that the shaver sits on and plugs into the wall. The shaver is not light and tends to try to pull the charger block out of the socket. I would have rather had a corded plug in charger that sat on the counter. This one is not a compact shaver and isn't quiet. The price was right when I bought it. Just my preferences I guess! Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Careful gal

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed given all the rave reviews. The razor was not able to shave any of the areas I was trying to use it for, including legs and bikini line. It could be because I have finer hairs. It’s also very loud and difficult to clean. I did use the bikini trimmer and that worked OK. I used it on the closest setting. It does take multiple takes on the same area. I’ll probably looo for another one since that’s all I’ll utilize this one for.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Does not provide a close shave, very poor coverage
customer_reviews.text: After using this electric shaver for over 8 months, I have to recommend against purchasing it. It does not provide a close, clean shave. Even with full charge and shaving cream, it does not shave properly. I have to press hard against my skin to get it to shave my hair and even then it misses quite a few spots. I have to spot shave with a smaller razor to get all the spots it missed. The battery lasts less than 2 shaves and the shaver does NOT work when shaving dry. It's garbage. Don't waste your money. I will never buy a unit like this one again.
customer_reviews.author: R olafur

customer_reviews.title: I loved it until it stopped working:-(
customer_reviews.text: I got this razor in August 2018, and I LOVED it. Held a long charge, I was able to use it in the shower, and did a reasonably close shave, even in the lady parts. Then after a couple months or so of use it started taking longer to charge, like days. Then it started to be sluggish when turning on, but got up to speed after a few seconds. Then it didn't turn on without tapping it a couple times on the counter. It just kept deteriorating until it finally stopped working all together. I did use it regularly it for a year and a half, but is it too much to expect stuff to last longer than that?
customer_reviews.author: VIVIAN C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for dry shaving only
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this five stars. It doesn’t replace a regular razor but it’s close enough. It doesn’t give me razor burn and it’s haven’t had one nick or cut using it out of the shower. That said this razor turns into an epilator in the shower. It’s supposed to be wet/dry but if my legs are even moist it rips the hair out. I still really like it but if you want one for in-shower use I wouldn’t use this one.
customer_reviews.author: Juturna

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these razors a few years ago, and liked the way it worked; I especially liked that the head of the razor was easily removable to clean, and it had a small button you slide upwards to make the bikini shaver part slide up as well. It was very effective - until it stopped working months later. I decided to try the razor one more time, as I hate the razor I currently use, but again, I was really disappointed, as the razor I received arrived defective. The sliding mechanism on the top part did not slide. It didn't come up at all or barely moved. As such, I returned it and won't buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: SimplifyLife

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive charger with shaver.
customer_reviews.text: Would give this item a 5 star rating if charger had been received. Wife did not realize that charger should have been included until the Jan. 30.2020 deadline for returns had passed. Had to purchase a corded charger on 2/11/20 in order to continue using shaver. Cost almost as much as original product. Wife is 90 years old and did not tell me about this until last night (2/10/2020). Panasonic is usually reliable. This product was mfd in China - so no surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: GETS THE JOB DONE BUT WILL NOT LEAVE YOUR LEGS SILKY SMOOTH
customer_reviews.text: I am 57yo, and I found myself with no easy way to wet shave my legs that didn't involve contorting into positions this old body no longer wants to contort into. So I thought I would try dry shaving with an electric razor before my leg hair becomes braidable. My only standard: my legs look shaved. This razor met that standard. I can go out in public without being embarrassed. But buyer beware: it does not provide a close shave. Running my hands over my newly-shaved legs, the result felt more like I'd shaved 24-36 hours ago, when compared to a wet shave. Still, it accomplished my mission, and I currently have no man to impress closeup, so I'm good.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDenizen

customer_reviews.title: This product is a nightmare. No idea why its amazons pick.
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this product 5 stars but I cant. Ive owned this item for 2 months and used successfully twice but after today, I will never consider this item again. It is not sensitive, I have a 6 inch gash on my leg from it. Not only that, but even after fulling charging it 3 times today it died after 1 minute each time. I'm super disappointed. The first two times I used it, it was okay but didnt really do the job, i had to buy disposable razors and go back to get the areas it missed. Today, It gave me an ER visit and 13 stitches. Please dont trust this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Morris

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: Only use this on your bikini area if you have a week or so for the rash and cuts to heal. You can safely use it to shave your legs. You’ll just double the time, stubble and missed hairs of using a razor.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Worst shave ever + worst razorburn ever!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this thing managed to simultaneously tear up my skin while leaving most of the hair intact, but that's pretty much what happened. It felt as if I hadn't shaved at all, wet, dry, shaving cream or no, it makes no difference, it sucks at its job. Not only that, but I ended up with the worst razor burn I've ever had on my under arms and had to walk around in T pose to try to get some air on them and alleviate the feeling of itchy fire. At least it wasn't expensive. I can't remember the last time I've been so disappointed with a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Monica R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fair Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I am a 66 year old woman who has lost 125 lbs. I have old, crepe, loose skin that is very difficult to shave. This shaver works fairly well for me. I use it on my arms, legs and private parts. If you press too hard, it will leave razor burns and does nick me in very sensitive areas. Although, it does not nick me as badly as most other razors I've tried. I guess I'm chasing moonbeams to try and find one that doesn't. The full charge takes about 6 hours and only lasts me about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this particular shaver faithfully for over a decade; replacing it every few years or so when the blade starts to wear out and cut poorly - resulting in a less than smooth surface and unpleasant hair tugs. This one I bought recently was an epic letdown. It’s results were much more like an old, worn out shaver rather than the trusty tool I’ve sworn by in the the past.
customer_reviews.author: Gillette

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Christmas, because she was getting tired of having to buy those disposable razors all the time, not to mention getting cut trying to shave. This has made things easier, especially when she can use this in or out of the shower. She hasn't wanted to use a disposable shaver any longer, which tells me the product is doing what she wanted it to do, give her a good shave and not cutting herself. I would recommend this to others who are thinking about doing away with the disposable razors and get this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressed...
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful based on the reviews that this would be a great purchase, especially at this price point, but sadly it hasn't been. It doesn't do a very good job at all, whether used dry, wet, with shave cream, etc. It starts to cause irritation quickly having to go over areas, the vibration in the handle is a bit of a nuisance while having to hold it and I wind up having to use my regular razor to finish the job every single time which makes having this Panasonic pointless. Only positive I could see was that I never got a cut/nick using it thus far. So time to go back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: RLo

customer_reviews.title: Affordable replacement foil and blades no longer available
customer_reviews.text: I bought this razor five years ago and have been very happy with it. However, replacement foil and blades don't appear to be available any longer. You can get the inner blade from the Panasonic website but it costs more than the original razor. I like to change the blades once a year to make the shaving more efficient. I suppose it would be cheaper to just toss this one and buy a new one every year or so, but the green in me hates the thought of that.
customer_reviews.author: Arleen

customer_reviews.title: A better women's razor
customer_reviews.text: I have had several women's razors over the years, and this one is the best I have purchased. It shaves best wet with a lubricant. It shaves good dry, but not as close and leaves your skin dry. The trimmer works well for the bikini area. I used the razor to shave under my arms, but got razor burn. Will not try that again. Easy to clean and stays charged for several uses. Overall, I am happy I purchased this razor.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: I usually use depilatory creams but became concerned with chemical use, especially in my bikini area. This shaver has been a Godsend. I am African Jamaican with very coarse, kinky ingrown prone hair. It does take time to get used to manoeuvering the shaver; I use it in the shower. My hair doesn't grow back prickly and I have less ingrown hairs compared to razors. I enjoy a close shave and I use with confidence even in those intricate Lady parts..no nicks. Really glad I bought it. Battery life is also satisfactory, I get at least two full shaves.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C.

customer_reviews.title: excellent improvement on the older model
customer_reviews.text: I currently have been using the older panasonic model of this electric razor. Thought I would try this newer model, and it is definitely so much better. There is a spring to this newer one, so its easier to maneuver. and its got extra attachments the older one did not. Definitely try out this newer model, if you are a fan of the old one. I can no longer use regular razors on my skin, and need as close as a shave possible, and this newer model is a keeper. Great improvement panasonic!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sensitive areas at all
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolute garbage. Who uses this on their bikini line successfully? I have no idea. You need to go up and down over an area 80 times and still get patches of unshaved hair. Not to mention when trying to shave the actual line, you nip yourself regardless of if you use the shaver head or the pop up trimmer. I've tried using this multiple times and it's not worth it. Although I haven't gotten razor bumps, the nicks are not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: Close and fast shave
customer_reviews.text: I get terrible bumps using razors no matter what I do so I got this. This is a life saver. Have used it 3 times now and it is a pretty close cut. I haven't cut myself at all and it is super easy to clean and comes with a little brush to help me. I don't mind the charge time. And the shave time is quick. The only down side is the gaurd doesn't really do anything for me. I think it should be closer to the razor but that's just me. All in all, pretty good. Edit: I just realized the bikini trimmer is adjustable. Definite 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I had used this model for years until the parts wore down. It was cheaper to just replace the whole thing than purchase replacement parts. Unfortunately, I was very disappointed with my most recent purchase. On the second use it slipped from my fingers from ankle height so it only fell a couple of inches yet that was enough to break it. It still turns on but it doesn't work very well, it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: This item is defective. It will turn on, but it doesn't actually cut the hair on my legs or underarms. I was advised to get an electric razor while I undergo chemotherapy, so I bought this one because of the price and ratings. It's terrible. I have to press hard to get it to shave, and even then my legs aren't smooth afterward. It works slightly better on my more fleshy parts (thighs) but anywhere with bone or muscle is a fail. Not only that, but I can't return it! Don't waste your money here.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Grier

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a three-day stubble at best
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the convenience of a dry shaver but this product is just awful. You have to go over and over and over the same spot to have any effect and even then the leftover stubble is like three days after I shave my legs in the shower. And apparently this item cannot be returned (I didn't realize that when I bought it), so I guess I am out twenty bucks-but you don't have to be. Keep shopping for a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Not as fast and close as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t a fan. I bout two razors at the same time. This one didn’t cut as close as the other,and was slower. I did like the flexibility of the heads. But overall there are better ones for only a few dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Corn

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: This changed my life. I will never go back to a traditional razor for shaving my thighs and bikini area. It’s much safer to use this for the bikini area than a traditional razor and you can reach more places. However, for my legs (where a closer shave makes a huge difference) this is not better than a traditional razor. I also get more ingrown hairs when I use this to shave my legs vs my thighs. So I will be using the combination from now on! I love that you can shave dry with this: sometimes you need to shave but don’t feel like taking a shower! I also think you can see the hairs better on dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: madelineraynor

customer_reviews.title: and then my skin was super irritated afterwards
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the least effective shaver I've ever had. I bought it because it's a trusted brand, but it took 5 or 6 passes on one area to get most of the hair off, and then my skin was super irritated afterwards. Not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper...alongside my old razor
customer_reviews.text: Great razor for sensitive skin and I love that I can use it wet or dry. I've always shaved in the shower, but I'm surprised how often I dry shave since I bought this--I actually prefer it when shaving my underarms. Gets a surprisingly close shave, but hair grows back faster. As for razor burn/bumps, I haven't any problems with this...but it's probably because it doesn't get as close a shave as my Gillette Mach 6 when it comes to more private areas. Overall, I'm glad I bought and it has become my primary razor for my underarms and legs, but I do still use my old razor for an extra close shave that lasts for days.
customer_reviews.author: HMC

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: i had high hopes for this razor with all of the good reviews. however, it just let me down. i feel like the only good part is the blade that flips up. without that, i feel like it doesn't do anything. you have to continuously go over the same area & it barely takes off any hair. bikini line works, but i'd be afraid to go to any sensitive places with it. good things--minimal tugging, feels well made, and is very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Quick, hassle free, smooth, perfect
customer_reviews.text: So I stopped shaving my legs for a year because I'm an incredibly lazy person and shaving my legs in a tiny, cramped shower with a crappy water heater was way too much of a hassle. My husband, however, was not happy being married to a yeti. So I bought this shaver, the first electric shaver I ever bought, and oh my God it is the best thing since sliced bread. It took less than 10 min to trim my hide down to nothing and the shave was so close and smooth. Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great razor anytime anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing this is my second one first one was a gift, and I used it to death it just died, but I had that thing forever, so I had to get myself a new one because it just works great. The charge lasts for a very long time on it. You can dry shave, shower shave anywhere, anytime, anyplace (lol). Ok, maybe not all that but you get what I am saying here. You won't be left disappointed just a little less hairy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable Battery Won't Hold Charge After 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this in April. This has the worst rechargeable battery life of any of this product that I've purchased. My other two lasted for less than a year, but this rechargeable battery already will not hold a charge already and I've had it less than 4 months. A piece of junk. I'm so disappointed as it shaves decently.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Total piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time with this piece of junk!! Bought 8/29/18 and as of today 6/14/19 it doesn't work worth beans! It's dull, slow and inefficient. Not even 1 year is all we were able to get out of this junk!! There is a reason it's only $17.99... Although I see it's $15.19 now! $14.61 for a replacement blade for a shaver that costs $15.19.... COME ON PEOPLE!!!! YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw or device flaw?
customer_reviews.text: Updated: The device itself works great. Very powerful and close shave for a while. Something inside my shaver messed up and it no longer worked. It basically acted like it had a dead battery; it would start off powerful and quickly die down until it just stopped. Turning it off and on would do the same but each time less powerful. (Yes I tried charging it) BUT IF I took the head off of it and let the mechanisms be free it was super powerful and acted normal until placing the head back on. So there was just either a defect in mine personally, or a flaw in the design. Just beware ;)
customer_reviews.author: jeanahoney

customer_reviews.title: Defective and previously used PERSONAL item. The fraudulent sale probably broke public health laws.
customer_reviews.text: Was misplaced for a year and never used. I found it yesterday and charged it for 24+ hours. The shaver was still dead. I took it off the charger, flipped off the plastic lid and exposed the trimmer. What I discovered was the sickening. There was hair under the cap. Not only did I get a piece of crap, broken shaver, but it was used. Absolutely unacceptable. This seller deserves to be kicked out of Amazon. Disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: absoloodle

customer_reviews.title: Could use improvement
customer_reviews.text: As far as shaving it works great but i'm docking it one star for two shortcomings. One: There should be a light on the charger that tells you when it is fully charged. Overcharging can shorten battery life significantly. I was really surprised that you can only plug it in and give it what you think is sufficient time to be fully charged. Two: The weight of the unit can cause it to pull free from the wall socket during charging process. Again it would be better with a wall wort with led charge state light and cord to shaver. Finally: It is good as a shaver and its a shame it lacks in these two areas.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Love this shaver!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin, and this shaver is amazing! After reading some reviews about how this razor was cutting and scratching up their legs, etc., I was hesitant about purchasing this brand. However, I gave it a try and was very glad I did! I had absolutely NO nicks, scratches and best of all NO razor burn on both legs and underarms. It's a nice close shave leaving skin smooth - yay to no stubbles! I have no idea how this shaver could possibly do such damage as mentioned in other reviews (nicks, scratches etc.) unless it was defective in some way or used incorrectly. Mine works perfectly and beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product, have been using this brand and same product for years, no need to change. It is so gentle on dry, rough skin, but yet does a fantastic job, now if you can figure out how to slow down the hair growth on legs, underarms certainly would appreciate it (no wax, or anything of the sort). Thanks for a wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.author: 88KEYBOARD

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: Mine seems defective. There are 3 parts to the head. The center part should protrude more but doesn't. I can push down the end sides but they won't stay down. I read the instructions to see if there was a trick to get it to work but nothing. Wish I would have tried it within the first 30 days and before I threw away packaging. I would have definitely returned it. I've had many electric razors and this one, or at least mine, seems defective.
customer_reviews.author: Karen v

customer_reviews.title: Some pros some cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: *easy to hold *2 blades *easy to clean *Doesn't leave you feeling itchy nor does it leave cuts like a razor does Cons: *The blade provided for longer hair feel like you are being scraped with sharp nails. After the first try, I never used it again. *It takes forever to shave your legs. No matter how long or short my hair was, I had to go over it a million times. Honestly makes you just want to shave *I would advise charging it before each use. I feel like the battery is not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne W.

customer_reviews.title: Yay! No more shaving in the shower and going through razor blades!
customer_reviews.text: Now, shaving is really easy. When I finish showering, I dry myself off, and then can easily shave all areas that I need to. Armpits are the trickiest part to shave. It's hard to shave in the armpit crevice so I use the pop up trimmer to cut off long hairs and then finish off with the shaver head. Tip: the best angle I've found to hold the electric razor at is perpendicular (90 degree angle) to your skin. Thank you, Panasonic, for making shaving so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Not what I'd hoped it'd be
customer_reviews.text: After reading through all the reviews I figured this would be exactly what I needed and a great purchase. Well, it's not. It's big and hard to hold, and it's horrible for the bikini area (probably because it's so big), and the blade(s) just didn't cut well at all. I would not recommend, especially since there's no way to get your money back, which if I would've know that I probably never would've purchased it to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: CA Granny

customer_reviews.title: Great little shaver!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used an electric shaver since 8th grade. Boy, they sure have improved the experience! After reading many reviews on several products, I decided to give Panasonic a try. Since having had surgery for breast cancer and a lymph node dissection I have been unable to shave my underarm, so I really anticipated delivery. As soon as it arrived, I opened the package and used it straightaway on dry skin. Worked like a charm! Is it as smooth as a disposable razor? Maybe not, but darned close (and more convenient to use!) In the long run I can't say what the life will be, but for the money I truly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deb D'Eliscu

customer_reviews.title: Shaved legs? Ain't nobody got time for that.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a godsend. When I moved to the Southern US, the first thing I had to do was ditch most of my long sleeved shirts and pants, and trade them in for tanks and shorts. This also meant I could no longer hide my Northhern wilderness/Chewbacca-style shrubbery on my legs and in my pits. But shaving every damn day? Nuts to that nonsense. This gadget here, however, makes that nonsense a little more sensical. Two minutes. Maybe less. Both legs and my pits. It's super convenient, and though it never gets quite as close a shave, I will never go back to paying a king's ransom for disposable blades.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Worked twice - now nothing
customer_reviews.text: This item worked twice but now it doesn't turn on. This item is not eligible for a return or replacement so I lost my money. I'm starting to think that the Amazon review system is being hijacked as this is the second Highly rated item that performs poorly. I rely heavily on the rating system so I hope that the two poorly perform items are a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Vakota

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a daily shaver. I have used the ol' razor in the shower routine FOREVER. In light of Covid, I was not longer able to get my bathing suit area waxing done. I am also tired of shaving with traditional razors and thought I would give this a try after reading all the great reviews. It works fantastic. It's easy to hold and easy to charge. Just plug in the charging "brick" and set the razor on top...DONE. Gives a close shave and much faster and safer than traditional razors. If you are thinking about buying it - buy it. You will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Pop up trimmer doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: The plastic parts inside don't line up properly and the plastic is rubbing badly on the parts that are supposed to pop up the little trimmer. I'll add a star later if it gets fixed/replaced and a picture of the defect when I get a minute. It works great as an electric razor. As good as any I've tried. I got tired of buying replacement blades. This is quick and easy. Also allows for dry shaving, which is a big plus for me. Also love the compact charger. I'm so tired of cords!
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Not a smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: I have had a hard time shaving with this razor. It leaves left over hairs and does not give me a smooth shave. It can be "grabby" especially along the bikini line and is painful along there as well. I am unable to shave my armpits even when it is fully charged. I followed the directions when I received it but it still has the same outcome. I have asked to return it but they are not letting me so I guess I am stuck with it. Thankfully, it was not pricey but it is much easier (and faster) for me to shave with a normal razor.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, but it broke :(
customer_reviews.text: I really loved how simple this shaver was. The plug on the wall is awesome because there’s no cables you just plug it into the wall adapter. I wasn’t getting as close as a shave as I wanted to but I found that pushing down a little more did cut it down. What I really liked is that there is no adapter heads to change out. The trimmer for bikini is built it you just push up a switch. Unfortunately a piece in the shaver broke and I can’t use this anymore. I contacted amazon and they said to reach out to buyer which I have yet to hear back from...
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Dull and not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst shaver I have tried. It seems as though it was dull from the start. It pulls the hair instead of trimming and I have to pass over the same area multiple times. When I try to rinse the hair off the motor gets sluggish...like it’s getting water in it or something. It makes me nervous to use it. If I hadn’t tossed the box I would return it. A total disappointment. I can’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: This Shaver Changed My Life!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Shaver Ever! Never used a electronic shaver in my life (I’m 47) and I was totally skeptical... well guess what!? This product is so ridiculously amazing! You can comfortably and easily dry shave your legs in 2 minutes for a party or dress/shorts wearing event! This shaver changed my life!!! I hope it can do the same for you! Good luck!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best shaver i ever used!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have absolutely nothing bad to say about this shaver!!! The best shaver i ever used! Very clean and smooth shave! Powerful and works amazing! Beautiful design and comfortable! Read the instructions and followed them! Charged for 24 hrs as it said to do! Best shaver ever and only $ 24.99 Big thumbs up 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hate it, but wouldn’t repurchase
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this gives me the worst shave I’ve ever had.. I’ve used both wet and dry and no matter how many times I pass this over my legs, I still have stubble left behind. The one positive I have is that my armpits get super bad ingrown hairs with a normal razor, but because this doesn’t shave the hair all the way down to the skin, I no longer have that problem. It shaves the hair close enough that you can’t see it from a distance, but if someone is going to be touching your legs, this is not for you
customer_reviews.author: Morgan L.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst shaver ever! Not sure why I bought this because I had something similar many years ago. I guess I was hoping they learned how to make them better. Not sure what this is actually made to shave because it doesn't actually shave much..
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Old Faithful for many years however.........
customer_reviews.text: ........the one I received must have slipped through quality control. I’ve owned this same model for at least 10yrs. It no longer holds a charge so I ordered another one. The replacement is damaged. The handle shakes instead of vibrates and the motor is louder than my last one; like there is a piece missing inside that somehow holds it together (see video). I am going to return & request a replacement if possible. Otherwise, It’s time for me to look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: This shaver will only work if you have super wispy hair. I am arab and african and I have thick hair, this pulled hair, nicked me like 6 times, and I was not even able to finish the job. Don’t buy it. For those with thick hair like me, buy one of the men’s “man scaping” shavers, as they are much much much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lamski

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: It’s like $30 for a very average razor and bikini trimmer, BUT you definitely won’t get any cuts. It stings a little for a very spotty shave. I’m not super picky about my body hair and having 100% shaven skin, so I’ll probably keep using it, but other, cheaper razors have definitely worked better for me in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye razors
customer_reviews.text: I have a skin condition that is made worse if I shave, so I bought this electric shaver to see if it could help me with my personal body hair preferences without causing my skin condition to worsen. I absolutely love this thing! The battery lasts for a very long time and it gets my legs feeling super smooth. I also use it on my armpits - the area that I bought it for - and it gets everything smooth and I feel confident on the days that I'm in the mood to shave. Also use it for my bikini area. All around this is an awesome product and very well priced.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rachelle Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it had so many good reviews, but after trying it, I'm shocked there weren't more bad reviews. I bought this to shape up my bikini line, but it gets clogged quickly and then it starts pulling the hairs out. It was literally more painful than when I wax there. I also tried it on my legs, but the hairs were short and it didn't even begin to clip them. I cant imagine a close shave is possible with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: The Courtinator

customer_reviews.title: Good on the go shaver.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for on the go shaving, or if you're too lazy to do it in the shower/forget to catch a spot. If I am actually shaving my legs I have to do too many passes for this really to be worth it, but it is good for a missed spot, good for trimmed underarms, and good for trimmed bikini area. Once you trim the wacky hair down it will do the rest for you - and if you're consistent with when you go back to shave the lengths this shaver will have no problem. Only complaint is that it does die a little quickly, and the hair can build up very fast.
customer_reviews.author: AllyMW

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive, razor burn-prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my upper thigh area, a place where i cannot touch a razor too or i will be regretting it for weeks to come. This thing gets a close, razor-like shave. I have used it on my underarms as well, and am totally impressed. No bumps, red rashes or anything!! Definitely a win. I just hope the battery lasts! And note you have to charge it for 12 hrs before it's first use. The only thing annoying about it, is that it's gotta be taken apart to be cleaned after every use. But that's not a deal breaker, by far.
customer_reviews.author: Taelor Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it's not terrible. The razor shaves as it's supposed to and is comfortable to hold. The problem I have with it is when I want to use the trimmer on the edge of the head. The slider button to raise and lower the trimmer only works occasionally so I have to move it back and forth several times while watching to see when the trimmer rises. I"m sure eventually it'll stop working all together but for the moment it seems to cooperate after a while. This was an inexpensive razor and I got what I paid for. Maybe you'll have a fully functional razor, but I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: 8 years later works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: 8 years later this thing is still just as good as the day I got it. I typically only dry shave with this when I forget to shave in the shower. Definitely not as close as a regular razor but you’d have to get REAL close to be able to tell. I’ve shaved over deodorant, lotion, whatever. And this thing still works amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Christmas Harper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SUCKER! !
customer_reviews.text: I HATE TO SHAVE MY LEGS. This is the best purchase I have made in a while. Charged quickly, I Used the pop up trimmer to get the long hair, (been awhile) Hence my first line. Gelled up my legs and before I knew it I was done, rinsed, lotioned up and on my way. Fantastic! My legs are smooth, look and feel great. This frees me up a lot, I just would wear whatever to keep from shaving my legs. NO MORE! Cleaned up very quickly. HAPPY HAPPY HAPPY. And as I final note you Can't beat the price. Just a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: creole 170

customer_reviews.title: Worst Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I only used this once and that will be it for me. It didn't take long to charge, which was a plus... but then I used it.. I used it on wet skin/hair like it says to use it on, but within minutes of using and cleaning after every increment it started to pull at my hair. My hair was maybe 1/2 a cm and isn't coarse. Soon after it even tore at my skin. I was hoping that since it had pretty good reviews I would give it a shot, and i'm sorry I did.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: No replacement parts for this model. BE AWARE BUYER!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shaver, it works great. My issue: I purchased this 2 mos. ago and have been using it regularly. I used it 2 days ago and noticed that my leg was scratched and bleeding. I determined that one of the outer foils was dented and had a sharp edge. I do not blame manufacturer or Amazon. I must have dented it somehow. I contacted Panasonic for replacement part, to purchase, and was told "parts for this shaver are no longer available. She suggested I use Part # and Google it. I did, with same result. Now I need a another shaver! It is a shame because it was a great shaver for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Update as of 09/19: Not as good as the 1st one...Considering returning it but I got rid of the box =( I will contact seller. So this is the 2nd one I buy from this product the 1st one broke too soon (really bad and I got tired of trying to get a hold of the seller) and I have tried may others manual but this one fits in my hand so I really hope it doesn't break because this time I am not going to stop and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver but...
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking of buying this shaver and using it for many years, you may want to think again. I bought this shaver about 2 years ago and decided it was time to replace the foil & blade as recommended in the operating instructions. Unfortunately, there are NO replacement parts available for this shaver on the Panasonic website, and I could only find a replacement foil on Amazon, no blades. And, it is actually cheaper to repurchase the shaver ($19.99) than purchase just a new foil ($24.00). I may do that because I really love this shaver, but I am disappointed that there are no replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Linny Sue

customer_reviews.title: Bought for 12 year old, easy to use and great value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old, it's very easy to use and she's very happy with it. Very easy to use, keep clean, and great for a beginner who isn't ready for a (and razor burns or nicks.) I've bought more expensive electric razors that we didn't like as much. She has VERY sensitive skin and it's been great for her. Very pleased, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great in between shaves
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a fellow mom let me in on her secret. Who has time to wash their hair AND shave their legs every time they take a shower? Not me. I usually pick one and it's usually the hair. This baby is perfect for those in between days if I want to wear a dress or shorts. It doesn't get my legs completely smooth, but it's so close I can't muster the energy to care. Huge time saver and life saver. Highly recommend at this fantastic price under a Jackson. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: lmk823

customer_reviews.title: Too much work!
customer_reviews.text: Never have been able to figure these things out. Thought it would be easier to use. It seems easy enough, but doesn't provide a smooth shave and it hurts some. Not sure if it's my skin or if it's ripping out hair instead of shaving it. AND, it takes twice as long as a disposable razor.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Painful!
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I could return this. I used it once and it was OK. A couple tugs on the hair here and there but nothing terrible. I went to use it a second time and almost threw it across the room! It was pulling at every hair so hard that I could see my skin being raised where each hair was attached. This was extremely painful. Do not buy...unless you're into that kind of thing...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I've been wanting. I hate shaving- It takes forever, razors are expensive, and there's always the fear of razor burn. I will admit I'm am lacking in the body hair department, mine is fine textured and blonde so different hair types may have different results, I did both legs from the knee down in less than 5 minutes- I don't have leg hair above my knees which saves time of course. But my legs feel smooth with no irritation and that's from sasquatch, middle of winter leg hair growth. Definitely a winner in my book, no more hiding in maxi skirts this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Katie V.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING, WHY HAVENT I DONE THIS BEFORE?!
customer_reviews.text: SPRING IS COMING! We all know what that means! I have not been shaving for a while, ahem, like months.... I’m 43 and I have fair, light hair. My leg hair was long, but not extremely noticeable.... reading the reviews, I tried the trimmer first and then 1-2 passes, and the hair was GONE! No stinging, pulling, or chafing. I’m soooo impressed for the price! Oh, I should mention this was dry shave. My 15 yo daughter has thick, dark hair, and I ran a pass over her leg, and hair was gone! Just ordered her her own shaver. Haven’t attempted to tame the Wooly Mammoth yet, but I’m sure it will do an amazing job! 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: sharkeyirish

customer_reviews.title: Oh My!
customer_reviews.text: About a year ago, I bought a shaver, not this one, but looked at it.. I went cheap.. so sorry that I did! Anyway this razor works far better than the one I 1st bought. This shaver was ready to go out of the bag, but charged it up the allotted time. It has a pop out blade that works well for under arm hair. It is a keeper and for sure do not buy a brand you never heard of ... Panasonic has been around along time.. better shaver!
customer_reviews.author: Jinny12

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Defective Shaver
customer_reviews.text: What an epic fail!! I am now on my second electric shaver and this also quit working in less than 5 months. The first one I bought started to have multiple issues in such a short time span: coils loose, shaver separated, dying motor, charging issues. But, I really liked the shape and its great, close shave so I repurchased. The same thing happened again where it prematurely broke down. This is not worth the money and highly disappointed in the quality of this product - I'll be buying a quality, mens electric shaver this time around.
customer_reviews.author: WanderingStar

customer_reviews.title: 2 months later so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I use it for the bikini area. It doesn't give me the closest shave but good enough. I'm prone to ingrown hairs when shaving but with this I get little to none. Still can't be careless though; I still shave with the grain and not against. Haven't tried that yet. The only thing is after a few weeks the guard quit working. I rarely use that but if I do I have to take the head apart and manually lift it. Aggravating but it's not "broken" so...
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Charger
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried to use this razor because as soon as I saw the charger, I knew there was a major issue for me. What you see in the picture is the complete charger. The razor fits right onto the wall charger. No cables attaching to it. That's it. You could invest in a power extension cable, but this is an extra expense. Just wanted everyone to know. Now I requested to return it and amazon has refunded me for the razor, so I highly recommend amazon. The 1 star is for Panasonic which produced the razor itself. I would have done 0 but I had to do at least 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Deana H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This was great, while it lasted. I bought this as a first shaver for my daughter in January and she really liked it. It was a pain to charge, as it sits on a little charger base and has to be plugged directly into the wall. It isn't super stable, but we made it work. Fast forward to less than 5 months later and like other reviewers, ours won't hold a charge and it dies about halfway through shaving. Don't waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Three

customer_reviews.title: I stole it from the wife
customer_reviews.text: I have a relatively thick facial hair to deal with when shaving. This little razor is the ticket for me. The screen openings are a lot bigger than most men's razors, which allows for a really clean, smooth shave. i bought it for my wife to use in the camper since the shower was a small space, but looks like i am going to have to buy another for me. The battery may take a while to charge, but it last for many shaves. I highly recommend this razor. Outstanding price too!
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: It Didn't Do Very Well.
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Size is easy to hold when in the shower. Aesthetically pleasing. Easy to clean. Can do wet or dry. The Bad: This is does not work well for hair that is just over a fresh shaved length. The teeth are so close together, it misses a large amount of hair regularly. Becomes clogged ridiculously quickly. Can become hot and cause irritation on sensitive areas. The Ugly: Grabs my BFs facial hair, causing pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rose

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work... 😡
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered on Friday ... I unpackaged the shaver on Sunday evening and plugged it in to charge... shaver has been plugged in since Sunday 7 PM it is now Monday 7:32 PM charging indicator light is lit up unfortunately shaver doesn’t even work doesn’t turn on or anything... I am very disappointed and a dissatisfied customer unfortunately cannot be returned or refunded even though it doesn’t even work!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia hurst

customer_reviews.title: Worked Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: After reading the negative reviews, I was a little apprehensive. However, for $16, I thought, "What the heck?" I used it for the first time today and was pleased with the result. I have ultra, ultra sensitive skin with allergies, and it worked better than the blade razor I had been using on my legs and underarms. However, I did moisturize with a small amount of tea tree oil before shaving. Then I followed directions. Cleaned it out when I finished and hope it works the next time. Pleased with the purchase thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Great women's electric razor
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best women's electric shavers I have seen. It has a floating head, making it very easy to get around areas like knees. It's very quiet and it shaves very well. It can be used dry or wet and is easy to clean. It fits well in your hand and is easy to grip. I have paid 4 times the price of this razor for others only to find that they don't cut half as well. I'm extremely pleased with this razor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blades dull after first use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shaver to bring along on a trip. I charged it up as instructed and it worked great the first use. I charged it up again and went to use it the week of the trip and it no longer cuts. It's running, it has power, but it no longer cuts hair. And now I'm outside of the return window so it was a total waste of money plus I didn't have it for my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Charger stopped working after less than five charges
customer_reviews.text: The shaver itself was fine. Not as smooth a shave as a razor but I didn't expect as close a shave. The shaver worked as expected. It was easy to clean. The width of it made it difficult to shave around knees and ankles but it was okay. What was not okay was that the charger stopped working. I have had this about a month and already the charger is dead. I called about the warranty and I have to pay to have the unit shipped back to Panasonic. It's not really cost effective to send it back. Buying a replacement charger costs more than I paid originally for the shaver and the charger. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Panasonic Electric Shaver for Women, Cordless 3 Blade Razor, Pop-Up Trimmer, Close Curves, Wet Dry Operation, Independent Floating Heads - ES2207P
product_meta.description: Style:ShaverWith the cordless ES2207P Panasonic Close Curves Electric Razor for Women you can shave closely and comfortably with wet/dry convenience. Quiet, fully immersible and 100% washable, this ladies electric shaver is safe for use anytime on dry skin, or in the bath or shower at your leisure with lather from gel, foam or soap. Either way, you'll always enjoy, close, convenient shaving and trimming with this wet/dry shaver. The Panasonic ES2207P women’s electric shaver's three independently floating heads and hypo-allergenic stainless-steel blades and foil are especially gentle on sensitive skin, and designed to glide naturally along the body's individual contours for smooth results on legs, underarms and bikini lines. And for the perfect finish, a handy pop-up trimmer works as a bikini trimmer to quickly trim and maintains the bikini area, while also removing unwanted long or stray hairs anywhere you find them. This sleek, ergonomic women’s electric razor fits naturally in either hand for total shaving and trimming control. Cleaning the Panasonic Close Curves wet/dry shaver is quick and simple. Just rinse the lady shaver/trimmer under running water to remove stubborn gel, soap and stubble, leaving the blades and foil fresh and renewed. And for shaving and trimming away from home, the Panasonic ES2207P ladies electric razor comes with a compact AC charger and a travel pouch.
feature_bullets: Sharp shaving blades: Panasonic close curves women's electric shaver with three ultra sharp blades and ultra-thin foil follows body contours for a quick, close and comfortable shave

Flexible pivoting heads electric shaver and trimmer 2 in 1: Three independently floating flexible pivoting heads glide effortlessly to trace the individual contours of legs, arms, under the arms and bikini areas; Build-in pop up trimmer with attachment details legs, underarms and bikini area
Wet/dry shaving convenience: Wet/dry waterproof shaver allows for convenient shaving in or out of the shower. Safely shave sensitive skin with hypo allergenic blades

Hypoallergenic stainless steel blades: High quality, hypoallergenic stainless steel blades and foils are especially gentle on sensitive skin to avoid irritation while shaving and trimming. Power source AC 100 - 120V. Dimensions (H x W x D) 5.9'' x 2.1'' x 1.8''. Usage per charge approx. 10 shaves (3 meter inches/1 shave)

Cleans in seconds: 100 percentage washable shaver cleans in seconds under running water; Rechargeable battery charges in 12 hours for up to 20 minutes of peak power shaving and trimming; Portable and travel friendly
